summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 LEXUS ES350. THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V006000 (AIR BAGS) FOR THE FRONTAL PASSENGER AIR BAG INFLATOR EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE REPAIR. THE CONTACT RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTIFICATION IN FEBRUARY OF 2017. THE DEALER (HERB CHAMBERS LEXUS, 25 PROVIDENCE HWY, SHARON, MA, 02067) STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE FOR REPAIR AND MAY TAKE MONTHS. THE MANUFACTURER WAS ALSO CONTACTED AND CONFIRMED THAT PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE FOR THE REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER ALSO STATED THAT PARTS WOULD NOT BE AVAILABLE UNTIL DECEMBER AND THAT THE CONTACT WAS IN ZONE C. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
